name: OFFMOTH
description:
OFFMOTH In the distant outer space, a lone alien species known as an Offmoth flies across the cosmos searching for its next meal. Its next journey brings it into a nearly wrecked space station, where multiple different factions are battling to conquer the territory and its resources. The Offmoth cares not for the ongoing conquest. Amidst the chaos, the Offmoth sees a potential feast. Delectable feed it has never tasted before!

In OFFMOTH, you play as a green alien known as the Offmoth. Feast on the soldiers in the space station while avoiding dangerous heavy fire from all kinds of military technology. Lucky for you, the Offmoth will transform into anything it eats, granting YOU their advantages. Eat enough targets to win!

Controls:
